mapper.insert: insert into cart ( c_no, pName, pPrice, pImage, sellerNick, seller, detailPageUrl, salePrice, delivery, buySatisfy, discount, mileage, u_no, count) values ( #{c_no}, #{pName}, #{pPrice}, #{pImage}, #{sellerNick}, #{seller}, #{detailPageUrl},#{salePrice}, #{delivery}, #{buySatisfy}, #{discount}, #{mileage}, #{u_no}, #{count})
mapper.update: update cart set count = #{count} where c_no = #{c_no} and u_no= #{u_no}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where u_no=#{u_no} and c_no =#{c_no}
